metadata.Title: CVE-2012-0786 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
The transform_save function in transform.c in Augeas before 1.0.0 allowslocal users to overwrite arbitrary files and obtain sensitive informationvia a symlink attack on a .augnew file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-0786` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

augeas-lenses - 1.1.0-0ubuntu2
augeas-tools - 1.1.0-0ubuntu2
libaugeas0 - 1.1.0-0ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: augeas package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.0-0ubuntu2').
